channel.title: Posts on Osaka Cycling
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Osaka Cycling

item.title: North Osaka Cycle Path
item.description: If you are thinking to enjoy cycling in Osaka, Japan, There would be several choices listed below. North Kawachi Cycle Path South Kawachi Cycle Path Naniwa Cycle Path North Osaka Cycle Path North Osaka Cycle Path begins at Osaka city hall. It reaches Expo'70 Commemoriative Park. Although people usually go from south to north, I took opposite direction. North Osaka Cycle Path - Map Starting from Expo'70 Commemoriative Park It was unclear where North Osaka Cycle Path begins.
